EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Reminder - Seattle
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow at the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Leader’s Guide Workshop taking place tomorrow in Seattle.
The Leader’s Guide To Adopting Lean Startup at Scale Friday, July 15th, 2016 Registration @ 9:30am Sessions Start @ 10:00am Lunch will be provided Workshop Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers/seattle]]>
Location Galvanize Seattle <[[http://www.galvanize.com/campuses/seattle-pioneer-square/]]> 111 S. Jackson Street Seattle, WA Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Galvanize+Seattle+-+Pioneer+Square/@47.5989543,-122.3359903,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x54906aa4c2d37a93:0xc82c719d1795d092!8m2!3d47.5989507!4d-122.3338016]]> Parking Information <[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7IxBOTTIF-EeHFmd0lEWXd1LUxwTlpjRGN1UHZYbzRuZkNR/view?usp=sharing]]>
Questions? Contact us at leadersguide@pivotal.io <[[mailto:leadersguide@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
